title: Penthouse Ultra Lux Living Downtown Union Station
neighborhood: Downtown Union Station RiNo LoDo Highlands LoHi
posting_body: Residence 1002 is a contemporary one-story Penthouse with two bedrooms and two-and-a-half bathrooms.
Luxurious ash hardwood floors fill this 2,265 square foot space and stunning views of the city with a backdrop of the rocky mountains are showcased apartment-wide.
The marble fireplace is a true show stopper and combines comfort and elegance for an enjoyable ambiance throughout the living and dining space.
Expansive storage spaces featuring custom California Closet systems can be found throughout the apartment.
The terrace boasts 480 sqft of private outdoor space and natural gas hookups allow for easy entertaining.
Large primary bedroom with ensuite and sizable soaking tub are sure to create an environment of relaxation.
or Email Gene for fast showings
Pricing, availability, and lease terms are subject to change without notice.
